search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for LMN (lmn.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for LMN software is available at this URL: [https://golmn.com/pricing](https://golmn.com/pricing)【5:0†source】.

citations.title: Plans & Pricing - Landscape Management Software - LMN

extracted_content.content:
More than 3,000 contractors and 50,000 crew members use LMN. You’re in good company.

![Image 1](https://golmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Starter-package-lockup.png)

###### Subscription Level

Built for growing companies, the Starter plan comes with the essential LMN features you need to get and stay profitable.

*   Best for companies with 1-3 crews
*   Includes **1** office/crew lead license and **5** crew member licenses

STARTS AT

### $297/mo

###### **MOST POPULAR**

![Image 2](https://golmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Pro-package-lockup.png)

###### Subscription Level

Operational efficiency is the key to sustainable growth. Reduce waste and improve your field communication with the Professional plan.

*   Best for companies with 15-50 employees
*   Includes **3** office/crew lead licenses and **15** crew member licenses
*   Additional licenses available for a fee

STARTS AT

### $598/mo

![Image 3](https://golmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Enterprise-package-lockup.png)

###### Subscription Level

With multi-locations, analytics and ongoing one-on-one support, LMN scales to support your business – no matter how big.

*   Starts at **15** office/crew lead licenses and **35** crew member licenses
*   Includes Greenius and **40** training seats
*   Additional LMN licenses and Greenius seats available for a fee

SCALES TO SUPPORT YOU

### Contact Sales

###### **PREMIUM SUPPORT**

###### **DEDICATED ACCOUNT MANAGER**

### Not sure which plan you need?

[Compare features](https://golmn.com/pricing/#compare-features)

Success right from the start.
-----------------------------

We believe LMN will help your business grow- and we’re hands on from the start.

Every LMN subscription comes with the support you need to get up and running. Together, we’ll configure your software to make sure it fits your business.

[Learn more about our Launch Packages](https://golmn.com/launch)

| LMN Launch | Starter Launch | Professional Launch | Enterprise Launch |
| SMS customer messaging | Available as add-on![Image 21: Icon](blob:http://localhost/34a963c33717ad6441a86916ff7caaa0)$75 one-time fee + $30/mo.

 | 500 SMS/mo![Image 22: Icon](blob:http://localhost/34a963c33717ad6441a86916ff7caaa0)$0.06 per additional SMS.

 | 2,000 SMS/mo![Image 23: Icon](blob:http://localhost/34a963c33717ad6441a86916ff7caaa0)$0.06 per additional SMS.

 |
| Greenius | Available as add-on![Image 24: Icon](blob:http://localhost/34a963c33717ad6441a86916ff7caaa0)$97/mo + $9.97/training seat.

 | Available as add-on![Image 25: Icon](blob:http://localhost/34a963c33717ad6441a86916ff7caaa0)$97/mo + $9.97/training seat.

 |  |
| Growth Accelerator![Image 26: Icon](blob:http://localhost/34a963c33717ad6441a86916ff7caaa0)Ongoing virtual coaching sessions with a dedicated Account Manager to unlock the full potential of LMN.

 | Available as add-on![Image 27: Icon](blob:http://localhost/34a963c33717ad6441a86916ff7caaa0)Available for $100/mo.

 | Available as add-on![Image 28: Icon](blob:http://localhost/34a963c33717ad6441a86916ff7caaa0)Available for $100/mo.

 |  |

###### \*Savings quoted are based on standard pricing vs discounts and subscription terms. Changes and saving may apply. All prices listed in USD.

### **Questions? We have Answers.**

**What is included in a Free Account? When does the account expire?**

A Free Account gives you 30 days to test drive LMN Professional. You can use all features of the software during the trial period.

While we do offer customer support during your free trial, setup and implementation is not included.

You can also get a live, [60-minute demo](https://golmn.com/live-demo-signup/) of the software to learn about the features and functionality.

**What is the difference between LMN Starter and LMN Professional plans?**

The LMN Starter plan is built for companies with 1-3 crews, and comes with the essential LMN features you need to grow. Starts with 1 Office Staff / Crew Lead and 5 Crew Member licenses.

The LMN Professional plan is for companies with 15-50+ employees, where efficiency, reducing waste, and improving your communication is the key to sustained growth. Starts with 3 Office Staff / Crew Lead and 15 Crew Member licenses.

Certain features, like job costing and ACH payment processing, are available in LMN Professional but not in the Starter plan. Please review our [feature list](https://golmn.com/test-plans-pricing/#compare-features) or [book a meeting](https://golmn.com/demo/schedule-meeting/) to learn more.

**What is the difference between Office/Crew Licenses and Crew Member Licenses?**

Office/Crew Lead licenses are for anyone who accesses LMN’s main dashboard and enters, manipulates, or deletes data. They are also for crew leads who log time and update job information.

Crew Member licenses are for any crew member that you need to track on timesheets, export for payroll hours, and have access to the LMN Crew app.

Crew members will be able to view their schedule, job files, hours worked, and personal timesheet in LMN Crew, but will not be able to clock in themselves. Crew licenses are sold in packs of 5.

**Can I pause my account or pay less during my off season?**

There is no option to pause your account or pay reduced subscription fees. However, you can deactivate monthly user licenses when they are not being used.

You can add user licenses at any time.

**How hard is it to get my data into LMN. Can you help me?**

Every paid LMN subscription comes with LMN Launch – our program that ensures you get up and running.

LMN Starter Launch includes guided, group setup sessions. You bring your documentation to the session, and we’ll help you customize your LMN experience. LMN Starter Launch **does not include** any direct data entry or upload.

LMN Professional Launch, Premium Launch, and Enterprise Launch offer one-to-one guided setup and **includes** direct data upload. Please see our [Launch page](https://golmn.com/launch) to learn more.

**How long does it take to get up and running with LMN?**

This will depend on you and your schedule. Most companies can expect to spend about **27 hours** spread across **4-6 weeks** to get up and running. This time is spread across your team and tailored specifically to their organizational role.

Please see our [Launch page](https://golmn.com/launch) to learn more.

**Have additional questions?**  
[Book some time with a product expert here.](https://golmn.com/demo/schedule-meeting/)

LMN offers plans that work for landscape companies of any size. Get started with our Starter, Professional, or Enterprise plan today.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes tiered subscription plans with additional fees for extra licenses and features.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Built for growing companies, the Starter plan comes with the essential LMN features you need to get and stay profitable.
Operational efficiency is the key to sustainable growth. Reduce waste and improve your field communication with the Professional plan.
